alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 27 at 5:15PM MDT until June 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 514 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was near Deming. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Emergency Management. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 75 and 87, and State Highway 11 from Deming to Sunshine. Locations impacted include... Deming and Sunshine. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
